instructions: Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 1 1 Launch the App Store from the app tray of your iOS device. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 2 2 Type Kindle into the search box of App Store, then tap on Kindle in search results. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 3 3 Tap on Install. The Kindle app will download and install itself on your iOS device, and display in the app tray when complete. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 4 4 Tap on the Kindle icon. This will open the reading app on your device. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 5 5 Sign in with your Amazon account information, or select the option to create an Amazon account. You must have an Amazon account to use the Kindle reading app. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 6 6 Launch the Internet browser on your iOS device and navigate to the Kindle Store website. iPad: Navigate to https://www.amazon.com/ipadkindlestore . Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 6Bullet1 iPhone or iPod Touch: Navigate to https://www.amazon.com/kindlemobilestore . Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 6Bullet2 Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 7 7 Sign into the Kindle Store using your Amazon account login credentials. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 8 8 Browse and search for books you want to buy for the Kindle reading app. You can browse bestsellers, daily deals, or new releases, or search for specific titles. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 9 9 Tap on the book you want to purchase, then tap on Buy now. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 10 10 Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase. After the purchase is complete, Amazon will deliver and sync the book to your Kindle reading app. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 11 11 Tap on Read now. The book will open and display in your Kindle reading app. [1] Advertisement

Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 16Bullet1 Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 17 6 Tap on the Kindle Store icon from the Home screen of the Kindle reading app. This will take you directly to the Kindle Store so you can browse and buy books. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 18 7 Browse and search for books you want to buy for your Android. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 20 9 Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase. After the purchase is complete, Amazon will deliver and sync the book to your Kindle reading app. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 21 10 Tap on the back button to return to the Home screen of your Kindle app. The book you purchased will now be displayed on the Home screen. Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 22 11 Tap on the book title. The book will open and display in your Kindle reading app. [2] Advertisement

Image titled Buy Books on the Kindle App Step 57 2 Verify that your device or computer is connected to a wireless or data network if you are unable to install apps or download books to your device.
